body.name: Sceptre 27-inch FHD 1080p IPS Gaming LED Monitor up to 165Hz 144Hz 1ms DisplayPort HDMI, FreeSync FPS RTS Build-in Speakers Gunmetal Black 2022 (E275B-FPT165)
features: IPS Panel: The IPS (In-Plane Switching) panel cannot be beat when it comes to consistently delivering top color performance and sharp visibility from multiple viewing angles.
165Hz Refresh Rate: Pushing beyond the standard refresh rate, 165Hz gives gamers an edge in visibility as frames transition instantly, leaving behind no blurred images.
Response Time 1ms MPRT: With 1ms MPRT, motion blur is eliminated and exceptionally crisp imagery is visible in the midst of chaotic combat.
320 Brightness: Remarkably vivid colors illuminate the screen like never before with 320 cd/m² brightness.
Blue Light Shift: Blue Light Shift reduces blue light, allowing you to comfortably work, watch, or play applications without straining your eyes.
body.description: Sceptre’s E275B-FPT165 27-inch IPS LED 165Hz Monitor - See and Play the Extraordinary No matter how fast the action gets in gaming, we have you covered. Marvel at the vivid colors and innovative design of the Sceptre FPT165 LED Monitor Series. The IPS panel and edgeless design delivers a vast range of clarity. Powered by an IPS (In-Plane Switching) Panel that delivers consistent and accurate color performances, this panel provides sharp visibility from multiple viewing angles that simply can’t be beat. With an LED Display that delivers sharper contrasts between lights and darks while delivering a vast array of rich colors, a more pleasing experience with moving images comes to play. With 320 cd/m² brightness, being able to detect subtle and robust color variations is easier and comes in handy when working on creative projects with remarkably vivid colors illuminating the screen like never before. Whether you’re photo-editing or gaming for long hours, 99% sRGB color gamut is there to help you. With 165Hz refresh rate, images change three times faster and smoother than the standard rate, reducing screen tearing and ghosting. With a clear visible advantage in competitive gameplay, the high refresh rate ensures a better gaming experience. Coupled with a 1ms MPRT response time (Moving Picture Response Time), enjoy the improved clarity viewing on your screen during fast action scenes in your movies or intensive action scenarios in your gameplay. Blue Light Shift application is also available to reduce the emission of blue light from your monitor, enabling the ability to work, view, and play for longer hours while protecting your eyes from fatigue, irritation, and strain. Our 27-inch curved monitor also supports AMD FreeSync™ Premium, providing gamers with smoother video and seamless on-the-spot movement in fast-paced games. AMD FreeSync™ Premium allows gameplay to reach the highest levels of performance by synchronizing the graphics card and monitor refresh rates to further eliminate tearing and stuttering, ensuring razor-sharp visibility in the midst of battle across all gaming landscapes. Anti-flicker technology is also available to provide a crisper image by preventing the backlight from flickering periodically. FPS (First Person Shooter) and RTS (Real-Time Strategy), Sceptre’s custom set display settings for gaming, are also available for a more enhanced experience. With a sleek, edgeless bezel design, immerse yourself in all the captivating action and imagery of your entertainment of choice. Multiple ports are offered with HDMI 1, HDMI 2 & HDMI 3 delivering an impressive 144Hz refresh rate, while DP 1 produces a stunning 165Hz refresh rate, all in FHD resolution. Take advantage of the 1920 x 1080 Full HD Resolution and 165Hz across the entire panel, whether it’s for work, play, or other. Can’t find the right angle? With our tiltable design, find that sweet spot that bridges clarity and comfort for your daily computer usage. Additionally, the VESA wall mount pattern provides you with the option of attaching the monitor to an articulating arm or mounting it on the wall, allowing you to free up desk space at your work or battle station. With a sleek, edgeless bezel design, immerse yourself in all the captivating action and imagery of your entertainment of choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IPS Panel The IPS (In-Plane Switching) panel cannot be beat when it comes to consistently delivering top color performance and sharp visibility from multiple viewing angles. 1ms Response Time With 1ms MPRT, motion blur is eliminated and exceptionally crisp imagery is visible in the midst of chaotic combat. AMD Freesync Premium With AMD FreeSync Premium, gamers enjoy smooth video & seamless on the spot movement in fast-paced games.The graphic card and monitor refresh rates are synchronized to eliminate tearing and stuttering.

Up to 165Hz Refresh Rate Pushing beyond the standard refresh rate, 165Hz gives gamers an edge in visibility as frames transition instantly, leaving behind no blurred images. Multiple Digital Parts While three HDMI ports each deliver an impressive 144Hz refresh rate, one DisplayPort produces a stunning 165Hz refresh rate, all in FHD resolution. Vivid and Brightness Remarkably vivid colors illuminate the screen like never before with up to 300 cd/m² brightness.

Build-in Speakers Perfectly suited to work & gaming settings, built-in speakers deliver robust & smooth audio while saving space on your desk. 99% sRGB With 99% sRGB, this monitor offers a wider color gamut than most conventional monitors, giving deeper colors and defining features. VESA Wall Mount Ready The VESA wall mount pattern gives you the freedom to select the optimum viewing position for your monitor, eliminate cable clutter, and save valuable space for your gaming and work station.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars life is good
reviews.reviewText: An excellent budget gaming monitor due to the current GPU shortage and the insane prices I'm stuck with a GTX 1080 for the foreseeable future, as a result I didn't want to go beyond a1080P Monitor, but wanted to replace my old 24" 75 Hertz panel in my dual monitor setup which died with something that had a bit more oomf.Installation was extremely simple no need to even open the manual which came with the panel, it also came with a Phillip's head screw driver to install the four screws which I considered to be a nice little touch.One caveat the monitor comes with a Display Port cable and no HDMI cable, this wasn't a problem for me because it was always my intention to install it via DP and I have a plethora of HDMI cables lying around but those seeking to utilize this through HDMI should be aware.This Panel itself exceeded my expectations, the picture quality is great, colors pop without being too over saturated or washed out, for best results I recommend fine tuning the settings, but you have the option to use one of the suggested presets, This is also my first free sync panel which works with Nvidia's Gsync software after enabling the option in the Monitor's options menu which allows for very smooth gameplay.Speaking of the Options Menu, the buttons to open and navigate it are located behind the monitor on the right hand side, it's a little fiddly because facing the front of the monitor you have no indicators or labels for the buttons and it will take some getting used to in order to navigate the settings.The monitor also has no vertical adjustment and can only be angled up or down which is to be expected for a budget monitor and is hardly worth complaining about.Beyond the minor gripes I've been very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price and performance
reviews.reviewText: This was a recommendation by a friend. Got it for a solid price on Cyber Monday. Comes with a Display port cable and ports. This is not something for everyone but it is for the gamers in your life. Havent had any issues and it plays at 165Hz like a walk in the park. Hopefully not too many people find this review because these things will disappear faster than we could imagine. Overall great monitor for computer gaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great budget monitor
reviews.reviewText: If you're just looking for something cheap and does it's job this is it. Colors are decent. On black screens you see bad bleed through of the backlight but manageable. Screen itself is very very thin. This doesn't have a USB port. The speakers arejt the best quality, but has 3.5mm audio out if you wish to expand. The hardware included is very very delicate. Easy to strip out screws with provided screw driver. Over all satisfied with purchase, and would recommend to anyone on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My first monitor
reviews.reviewText: It’s a pretty cool monitor so far no complaints. Probably because it’s my first monitor and it looks amazing by default. Noting bad I can think of since performance has been good and neat. I won’t lie installing for me took a bit longer since I didn’t want to damage the screen in anyway but was easy once I understood it. I wish I was able to adjust the monitor screen to go up and down like a rear view mirror in a car. But I’m sure there’s some out there that do. But as I said it’s my first monitor so it’s amazing and I love it. Will I buy again in a scenario of it dying or breaking. Will update once I get pictures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice television!
reviews.reviewText: This is a guest bedroom television so it is not used all the time but it has a great picture quality and works well. I will give it five stars and update again. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Pricing
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this monitor to replace another one. This one looks good, maybe you need to change some settings that will depend on your PC, but everything else is great. The base is made of good material. The 165hz working the Display port works perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got two of these for my gaming setup. Excellent picture. FreeSync ready!A little tip on these... You will only get the 165Hz if using the display port. The HDMI only supports 144Hz.The built in speakers are crap, so I use a set of external Bose speakers for my gaming needs.Been considering a third the picture is so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Turns off when used too long
reviews.reviewText: I am an avid gamer and netflix watcher, this monitor does not like being on for hours and turns off by itself and turns back on bc it gets too hot.

People talk crap about this brand and I was ready to send it back before it even arrived but I haven't had any issues. Works perfectly with my Radeon card and the refresh sync is amazing when your system is capable of 140+ FPS.

reviews.reviewTitle: Justo para lo que lo necesitaba
reviews.reviewText: El color es nítido,el volumen de las bocinas incluidas con una app como fxsound resalta más lo uso para gaming y la vdd muy buena opción lo único es que si fuera del altura ajustable sería mucho mejor pero lo que ofrece por el precio está muy bien
Me gustó bastante el monitor, lo obtuve en oferta y ha valido mucho la pena, la resolución y frecuencia hacen que este producto sea bastante adecuado para personas gamer o que se dediquen al diseño.
La verdad son mas de lo que esperaba las compre por una recomendación de un youtuber y en verdad la calidad de imagen es increíble, llegaron en perfectas condiciones y el tamaño es perfecto

reviews.reviewTitle: Great affordable monitor! Unfortunate for the power cable
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE how my games look with this monitor, I used to game on a TV screen so this is a big upgrade. My only complaint would be that the power cable provided is not good, it's wiggling on the monitor and is too loose which causes my screen to flicker.I had to buy a new power cable to fix the flicker issue. Maybe I was just unlucky but other than that I love the monitor :)
